model

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class GameModel defines an Instance operation that lets clients access its unique instance, and may be responsible for creating its own unique instance.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • readResolve

        private java.lang.Object readResolve()
                              throws java.io.ObjectStreamException
        Special hook provided by serialization where developer can control what object needs to sent. However this method is invoked on the new object instance created by de serialization process.
        Returns:
        the object
        Throws:
